plot: National Geographic Explorer investigates a growing controversy in connection with pet ownership rights. It is legal to own big cats like lions or tigers in most US states which often ends in tragedy for the owner, the pet or a bystander.
title: Big Cat Crisis
plot_es: National Geographic Explorer investigates a growing controversy in connection with pet ownership rights. It is legal to own big cats like lions or tigers in most US states which often ends in tragedy for the owner, the pet or a bystander.
plot_en: National Geographic Explorer investigates a growing controversy in connection with pet ownership rights. It is legal to own big cats like lions or tigers in most US states which often ends in tragedy for the owner, the pet or a bystander.
